Class omp2gpu

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.codegen.CodeGenPass
      • omp2gpu.codegen.omp2gpu

  • public class omp2gpu
extends CodeGenPass
    omp2gpu converts an OpenMP program into a CUDA GPU program

      • genKTuningConf

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> genKTuningConf(boolean useLoopCollapse,
                                             boolean useParallelLoopSwap,
                                             boolean useUnrolling,
                                             java.util.HashMap<CudaAnnotation,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> kOptionMap,
                                             java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> maxNumBlockSet)
        Kernel-level user directive output generator
        Parameters:
        useLoopCollapse - true if loop collapse optimization is applied
        useParallelLoopSwap - true if parallel loopswap optimization is applied
        useUnrolling - true if unrolling-on-reduction optimization is applied
        kOptionMap - hashMap of kernel-level options
        Returns:
        set of user directive outputs
